thread.title: The Crux Fermentation Project brewery in full swing
thread.title_full: The Crux Fermentation Project brewery in full swing | OregonLive.com

author: Thomas Boyd | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: The Crux Fermentation Project brewery in full swing
text:
The Crux Fermentation Project brewery in Bend, Oregon features a high-tech brewing facility and opened their doors on June 30th, 2012. The brewery, under leadership of former Deschutes brewmaster Larry Sidor, produces creative, high-quality brews with non-traditional methods in mind.
It's located in an industrial area at 50 SW Division Street, Bend, Oregon.
Hours:
Tuesday - Sunday: 11:30 a.m. to 10 p.m.
Monday: 4 - 9 p.m.
Phone: 503-385-3333
-Thomas Boyd | tboyd@oregonian.com
Twitter: @thomasboyd | Instagram: @thomasrboyddotcom
